FuncDef: This command configures a source MAC address or range to be used as a service ingress QoS policy match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Enter the 48-bit IEEE MAC address to be used as a match criterion. Values-HH:HH:HH:HH:HH:HH or HH-HH-HH-HH-HH-HH where H is a hexadecimal digit.
This 48-bit mask can be configured using the following formats:. Values-0x00000000000000 to 0xFFFFFFFFFFFF (hex). ParamDefault: Default- 0xFFFFFFFFFFFF (hex) (exact match)
